definition: to keep the peace; to patch up a quarrel (idiom)
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
would rather/to prefer/how (emphatic)/Taiwan pr. [ning2]
abbr. for Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2 xia4 Hui2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 qu1]/abbr. for Nanjing 南京[Nan2 jing1]/surname Ning
old variant of 寧|宁[ning4]
peaceful/to pacify/to visit (one's parents etc)
variant of 寧|宁[ning2]
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]

sentences.english: Honda has settled the strikes at its other two factories as well.
sentences.chinese: 本田旗下另两起罢工，均以厂方息事宁人告终。

sentences.english: Now it was too late to smooth things over, even if he wanted to .
sentences.chinese: 现在即使他想息事宁人，也为时太晚了。

sentences.english: Smoothing things over is practically a profession to mothers of families.
sentences.chinese: 息事宁人可说是家庭主妇的专职。

sentences.english: Yao Ming killed off the phone, in groups, to stop their noisy.
sentences.chinese: 耀明息事宁人，将电话放在群组，才停止她们吵闹。

definition: it is better to avoid unnecessary trouble (idiom)/the less complications the better
pinyin: duo1 yi1 shi4 bu4 ru2 shao3 yi1 shi4

definition: to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
to settle privately/to solve behind closed doors/to settle out of court
to try to smooth things over/to paper over the issues/to gloss things over
to play deaf-mute
in the wrong
a wise man looks after his own hide (idiom)/to put one's own safety before matters of principle
to know that one is in the wrong (idiom)
see 撕破臉|撕破脸[si1 po4 lian3]
to move aside/to get out of the way/to back down/to concede
to pester endlessly (idiom)/an annoying troublemaker
to have an acrimonious falling-out/to shed all pretense of cordiality/to tear into each other
where it is possible to let people off, one should spare them (idiom); anyone can make mistakes, forgive them when possible
pinyin: de2 rao2 ren2 chu4 qie3 rao2 ren2

definition: timid/to be afraid of getting involved/to be afraid of getting into trouble
to turn a blind eye
pinyin: zheng1 yi1 zhi1 yan3 bi4 yi1 zhi1 yan3

definition: lit. family shames must not be spread abroad (idiom)/fig. don't wash your dirty linen in public
